channel.title: The Purpose of Friendship Points?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "The Purpose of Friendship Points?"

item.title: Re: The Purpose of Friendship Points?
item.content:encoded:
There's a little bit of information on the allies page. Friendship has pretty much three purposes.

1) Get to "hanging out" with that ally (see the link above).
2) Getting to the point where they like you enough to unlock summons.
3) Getting to the point where they like you enough for special missions (like TicTac and Hijinks Ensue.

But for most allies, it's just about getting to the hanging out status.
